Key Match Events: Lahiru Kumara took 3 wickets for 35 runs, earning him the Player of the Match award.
Pathum Nissanka scored an unbeaten 77 off 83 balls.
Sadeera Samarawickrama scored an unbeaten 65 off 54 balls.
David Willey took 2 wickets for 30 runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka won by 8 wickets with 146 balls remaining.
Sri Lanka chased the target of 157 runs in 25.4 overs.
The match was held at M Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bengaluru.
England won the toss and elected to bat first.
Sri Lanka earned 2 points from the match.
